body.section: Hierarchy DelegationPolicy is a kind of BasicPolicy

section.title: Description
section.p: A delegation policy is intended to delegate access rights to a specific individual or organization (a grantee). ISO 22600-2 defines delegation as 'conveyance of privilege from one entity that holds such privilege, to another entity' and a DelegationPolicy as 'defines what authorizations can be delegated to whom'.

stentry.p: Designates who/what has been delegated a specific right.
